data.text: @CGEspManchester Are these people thick? How do these rules make any logical sense? We know now that transmission isn’t affected by the vaccine so why keep peddling this ridiculous embarrassing lie. Give it up!
@CGEspManchester Unvaccinated and got a flight to Mallorca in September. Need to get covid a third time just so I’m within the 180 days, better to be safe than sorry!
@CGEspManchester Muchos certificados se agotarán antes de julio y agosto porque la gran ola fue sobre la Navidad aquí 🤷

@CGEspManchester So if I'm healthy, don't have covid, never had covid and haven't been vaccinated, I still can't get in?

Come on, folks, just end this nonsense.
@CGEspManchester Drop these stupid rules once and for all.
@CGEspManchester So I need covid to come back so I can catch it and recover in order to go to Spain? 😂😂😂

@CGEspManchester Stupid rules that don’t make any sense. I’m vaccinated but could fly into Spain & infect people. My 18 year old can’t go to Spain with a negative test. Who is the danger here? We’ve booked Portugal instead - 5 star golf resort - money you could have had.
@CGEspManchester Not enough need to let everyone in now
